frontMatter.title: Why Discord is switching from Go to Rust
frontMatter.summary: Rust is becoming a first class language in a variety of domains. At Discord, we’ve seen success with Rust on the client side and server…

next.title: 使用AWS Lambda提高网站图片加载速度1X倍
next.summary: 网站流量中大头是图片资源，如何减少图片大小是很重要的事情。本文分享了使用AWS Lambda@Edge无服务架构通过判断浏览器UA自动转换CDN缓存的图片为Webp，将网站图片加载速度提高了1X倍以上
